thread.title: Child injured in Kansas City shooting
thread.title_full: Child injured in Kansas City shooting - KCTV5

author: Chris Oberholtz, Multimedia Producer
title: Child injured in Kansas City shooting
text:
KANSAS CITY, MO (KCTV) - One person is in custody after a child was shot in south Kansas City.
Police were called about 11 a.m. Sunday to the 8400 block of East 93rd Terrace.
The shooting happened inside the home, police said.
The child is in critical condition.
KCTV5 News is working to gather more details.
Refresh this page for updates.
